Get ESPN's WNBA team box data

Source: R/espn_wnba_data.R
espn_wnba_team_box.Rd

Get ESPN's WNBA team box data

espn_wnba_team_box(game_id)

Arguments

game_id

Game ID

Value

Returns a team boxscore data frame

Author

Saiem Gilani

Examples


# \donttest{
  try(espn_wnba_team_box(game_id = 401244185))
#>     game_id season season_type  game_date team_short_display_name
#> 1 401244185   2020           3 2020-10-06                    Aces
#> 2 401244185   2020           3 2020-10-06                   Storm
#>         team_uid team_alternate_color team_color team_display_name team_name
#> 1 s:40~l:59~t:17               c7cfd4     000000    Las Vegas Aces      Aces
#> 2 s:40~l:59~t:14               f7c43c     05452a     Seattle Storm     Storm
#>                                            team_logo team_location team_id
#> 1  https://a.espncdn.com/i/teamlogos/wnba/500/lv.png     Las Vegas      17
#> 2 https://a.espncdn.com/i/teamlogos/wnba/500/sea.png       Seattle      14
#>   team_abbreviation      team_slug field_goals_made_field_goals_attempted
#> 1                LV las-vegas-aces                                  22-64
#> 2               SEA  seattle-storm                                  38-80
#>   field_goal_pct three_point_field_goals_made_three_point_field_goals_attempted
#> 1           34.4                                                            2-5
#> 2           47.5                                                           7-26
#>   three_point_field_goal_pct free_throws_made_free_throws_attempted
#> 1                       40.0                                  13-18
#> 2                       26.9                                   9-12
#>   free_throw_pct total_rebounds offensive_rebounds defensive_rebounds assists
#> 1           72.2             33                  7                 26      14
#> 2           75.0             42                 11                 31      26
#>   steals blocks turnovers team_turnovers total_turnovers technical_fouls
#> 1      5      2        18              1              19               0
#> 2      8      2         6              2               8               0
#>   total_technical_fouls flagrant_fouls fouls largest_lead home_away opponent_id
#> 1                     0              0    21            9      HOME          14
#> 2                     0              0    18           35      AWAY          17
#>   opponent_name opponent_mascot opponent_abbrev
#> 1       Seattle           Storm             SEA
#> 2     Las Vegas            Aces              LV
# }
